document_data.name: Glamered
document_data.mainbody: '''''Glamered''''' armor was magically enhanced to transform itself upon command to take the form of ordinary clothing.
document_data.Creation: One who would craft ''glamered'' armor had to know the spell ''[[disguise self]]''.
document_data.Activation: ''Glamered'' armor appeared normally as regular armor. Upon the wearer's command, ''glamered'' armor changed form, taking the shape of a set of ordinary clothing. Its other physical properties, however, such as mass and level of protection, remained the same. When disguised, ''glamered'' armor could only be revealed as such by a ''[[true seeing]]'' spell or similar magic.
document_data.Notable Users: [[Mirt|Mirt the Moneylender]] owned a mithral shirt that was ''glamered''.
